name: Archimbaud's Repairs of All Trades
description:
A story driven puzzle game set in little repair shop that is owned by Renée Archimbauld, the main character. Easy puzzles are accompanied by personal stories of quirky characters and to get the whole picture you need to explore little bit. We used The Roaring 20s diversifier so the graphics is inspired by art deco.

Made during Global Game Jam 2020.

Art: https://twitter.com/ruchie_d

Writing: https://twitter.com/sykysan

Code: https://twitter.com/jarnik
